author: clundsberg
title: First Lego Magnet AND It Was Free!
review:
I gave this figure 5's across the board mostly from the perspective of my 5 year old.

He had a blast building this even though most may consider this building experience about as easy as a Lego set could be, he really lit up that he didn't need instructions to figure it out.  For a young child this is a nice accomplishment.

The parts got a 5 because I'm nostalgic for the 80's and it was cool to see my son get a retro figure.  Parts/playability also receive kudos as it's a figure piece and contains magnet - great for playability!  Currently Black Falcon is separated from the rest of Legoland with the important duty of guarding the ice cube dispencer on my fridge from a certain cat that resides in my home.

Value for money? IT WAS FREE!  Thank you Bricktober!  I wish I would have remembered that for the previous 3 weeks...hey waitaminute!  I bought that Jester not too long ago.  TRU owes me a magnet!
